hero.title: Audiovisual Production and Photography on the Costa del Sol.
hero.description: We are a content creation agency, expert in corporate videos, event coverage, reels and high-quality photo sessions.

servicesList.title: Corporate Video Production
servicesList.description: We create institutional videos that convey the essence of your company with high-impact visual narratives.

servicesList.title: Event Coverage
servicesList.description: We capture the energy and key moments of your corporate, social or cultural events.

servicesList.title: Reels and Social Media Content
servicesList.description: Designed to capture attention on Instagram and TikTok.

servicesList.title: Product Photography
servicesList.description: Professional images for social media, e-commerce, catalogs and advertising campaigns.

servicesList.title: Food Photography
servicesList.description: We enhance the visual appeal of your dishes and restaurants.

works.title: Our work
works.subtitle: Here are some examples of video and photography production carried out for our clients. Each piece reflects our commitment to visual quality, storytelling, and impact.

worksList.title: Cantina Canalla
worksList.description: Food and space photography for restaurant

worksList.title: RE/MAX Coast
worksList.description: Real estate and commercial space photography

benefitsList.title: Over 8 years of experience
benefitsList.description: Professional audiovisual production and photography with proven results.

benefitsList.title: Boutique approach
benefitsList.description: Each project is treated with personalized creativity and strategy.

benefitsList.title: Complete service
benefitsList.description: Pre-production, filming, editing and delivery. Everything in one place.

benefitsList.title: Wide coverage
benefitsList.description: Presence in Costa del Sol, Madrid and possibility of travel throughout the peninsula.

testimonialsList.quote: The video that Agencia Tinta created for our event was key to conveying our proposal. Highly recommended.
We needed professional food photography and the result exceeded our expectations. Human and very creative team.
We needed professional food photography and the result exceeded our expectations. Human and very creative team.
